Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: M. Miyashiro "JetMecTec"
Reviews.Content: It does work.  But I have a lot of issues with it.  The viewing window, on a camera this small is almost useless, but even funnier, it was delivered foggy! It is an internal lenses that is dirty so I can't clean it either.  As I don't plan on using it anyway, I didn't return it.  The internal battery doesn't last very long. In video mode, it will last maybe ten minutes.  The external battery would cure this, but it makes the the set up a lot more cumbersome.  Oh, and recently, that external battery unit has failed.  Photos taken with it are grainy, but for it's size, it's ok, I wasn't expecting a 8 megapixel photo.  It's a tiny camera and as a novelty, it's ok.

Reviews.Title: the real
Reviews.Author: anas almanee
Reviews.Content: Hi,It's really nice CAM  but they said it's about 8 mega pixels. I tried it I think it's less then 8.the Video  is really nice I like it.But it takes about 13 meanest not long as I thought.thank you.
